name: Baker's Dozen (itch)
description:
Baker's Dozen is a 2D pixel platformer with a delicious twist on the "save the princess" trope. Explore the cookie land above and below ground, battle corrupted cookie creatures using your baking tools, craft tasty treats to power you through to the next checkpoint, and fight off her captor to save the Cookie Princess.

Created by Claire Engvall, Isaac White, Talen Stephens, Viktor Hensen, Wendy Hoang, and Mingyuan Yang.
